channel.title: Beyond Damnation (2 Worlds) PK & Eco (Looking for Developers)
channel.description:
[SPOILER=Information][CENTER]Welcome to the Development page of Beyond Damnation. Beyond Damnation has two worlds. World 1 is a Hard Eco and World 2 is a Pk/Eco Server.[/CENTER][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=World 1 Features][CENTER]Features of World 1 99% Rs Combat 100% Slayer with runescape shop interface and Rslike slayer tasks 100% Mining, Ore Prospecting, Ore Depletion, Correct timers 100% Smithing, 100% Ore Smelting, 100% Armour making 100% Crafting, Gem cutting, Hide tanning, Hide crafting, Amulet Crafting, Stringing, Enchanting 100% Flethching, Bolt Fletching, Arrows, Bow Fletching 100% Woodcutting 100% Fishing 100% Cooking 100% Potion making 95% Farming 95% Runecrafting 100% Godwars Cluescrolls [/CENTER][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=World 2 Features][CENTER] Instant Switches Ep System PvP Drops Killstreak system with rewards Wilderness Timers Armour sets Castlewars Custom Whips Drygores [/CENTER][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2hJOvio.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7nv147i.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xylBJFq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/otZhPlw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LoDgvNj.jpg[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Want to apply to be on the Development team][CENTER] Beyond Damnation is looking for two developers. One of you will be working Soley on World two as less needs to be done on that server and we can start working on other unique aspects of the server, the other developer will be working on World 1 with me.
Follow this format to apply:
Name: Age: Experience: Role (W1/W2): Dedication: Skype Name: [/CENTER][/SPOILER]

item.title: Beyond Damnation (2 Worlds) PK & Eco (Looking for Developers)
item.dc:creator: @damnedpkz damnedpkz
item.description:
@damnedpkz wrote:

[SPOILER=Information][CENTER]Welcome to the Development page of Beyond Damnation. Beyond Damnation has two worlds. World 1 is a Hard Eco and World 2 is a Pk/Eco Server.[/CENTER][/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=World 1 Features][CENTER]Features of World 1
99% Rs Combat
100% Slayer with runescape shop interface and Rslike slayer tasks
100% Mining, Ore Prospecting, Ore Depletion, Correct timers
100% Smithing, 100% Ore Smelting, 100% Armour making
100% Crafting, Gem cutting, Hide tanning, Hide crafting, Amulet Crafting, Stringing, Enchanting
100% Flethching, Bolt Fletching, Arrows, Bow Fletching
100% Woodcutting
100% Fishing
100% Cooking
100% Potion making
95% Farming
95% Runecrafting
100% Godwars
Cluescrolls
[/CENTER][/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=World 2 Features][CENTER]
Instant Switches
Ep System
PvP Drops
Killstreak system with rewards
Wilderness Timers
Armour sets
Castlewars
Custom Whips
Drygores
[/CENTER][/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Media]



[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Want to apply to be on the Development team][CENTER] Beyond Damnation is looking for two developers. One of you will be working Soley on World two as less needs to be done on that server and we can start working on other unique aspects of the server, the other developer will be working on World 1 with me.

Follow this format to apply:

Name:
Age:
Experience:
Role (W1/W2):
Dedication:
Skype Name: [/CENTER][/SPOILER]

Read full topic
